settings.content: Catering to a wide base of clientele that ranges from young, vibrant and insta savvy college students to influencers, celebs and eminent personalities Affaires by Levell 5 has defined their very own niche focussing mostly on style, quality and silhouettes and not just on trends and fads. The wonderful couture range, that can be easily defined as diffusion, the attires are where drapes of silk-satin meets the rich embellished zardosi, the vibrant colours meet pastel hues and evening gowns beautifully accompanies long flowing skirts and silhouettes on the rack. Their specialty lies with their bridal range where there is a marked splendour in the use of zardosi work, metallic embellishments and tassels, which give each of their attire a unique flavour. Levell 5 caters to the wishes of every age, taste and personality thus giving shape to dreams.
